transfer.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens to the given recipient.

transferFrom.description: Transfers a specified amount of tokens from one address to another using an allowance.

transferLock.description: Transfers a specified amount of locked tokens to the given address.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given distributor address.

approve.description: Approves the spender to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that the spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of tokens for a specified address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller's account.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from a specified address using an allowance.

getAverageBalance.description: Returns the average balance of a specified holder.

getFullHolderInfo.description: Returns detailed information about a specified holder.

isRoundDepositsEnded.description: Checks if the deposits for a specified round have ended.

isRoundPrepared.description: Checks if a specified round is prepared.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

updateAndGetCurrentPrice.description: Updates and returns the current price.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.
